text:
How To Find The Root Of A Problem Within Your Business - 

First, check your systems and processes. Was your training sufficient for your employees? How do you hold employees accountable? 

Second, check the employee directly. Is this person improving? Have they peaked and they’re just not up to your standards? 

Finally, understand your environment and market conditions. This should be the last excuse because markets are always changing.

I don’t buy rentals in random areas… I’ve been down that road before and it was a total nightmare. 

When you have a rental in another state

- You don’t know the market that well
- You’ll need a property manager 
- And you’ll have to learn the state’s rules and regulations

It’s just not worth your time!
How Taylor Swift Was Able To Become A Billionaire With Average Singing Talent

“I don’t have enough time” is something I hear all the time… 

If you want something bad enough, you’ll figure out a way to make it happen.

“The biggest risk is not taking any risk... In a world that changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.” - Mark Zuckerberg 

By doing nothing, you’re guaranteed to lose… You’re not going to win by playing it safe ❌

Legacy isn't just about wealth; it's about impact. 

What kind of legacy are you creating?

There are a lot of rich people that are very ordinary… 

People don’t realize that you don’t have to be a genius like Mark Zuckerberg to be rich. Literally anybody can find success in real estate or other businesses! 💰 📈

'Experts' without experience suck. 

Everyone wants to be an influencer. Yet no one wants to do the hard work to accomplish something. 

But your advice is useless without a track record. 

Go build something first.

You don't have to be born rich to get wealthy.

79% of millionaires are self-made.

The most common denominators of their success:

• Learn a high-paying skill
• Save to invest in real estate
• Prioritize self-education for life

Wealth is a skill (anyone can learn).
The day you STOP caring what 99% of people think about you is the day you unlock your potential

If you have time to sit on the couch...

You also have time for:

• Working on yourself
• Working on your brand
• Working on your business
• Working on your leadership skills
• Becoming a better Dad and husband

Success = More Responsibility

If I LOSE all my money today...

I'm not worried because I still have my 3 most important assets:

• My skills
• My relationships
• My influence on social media

These assets outweigh everything else.

What's the first thing you'd do if you lost all your money today?

How to stay broke for life:

• Work your 9-5 for 40 years
• Pinch pennies until you're 70
• Rely on a 401(k) for financial freedom
• Wait for a raise instead of creating one

Wealth is a mindset.

Don't wait for someone to save you.

Save yourself.
Your number one investment in life will always be yourself. Start early and invest often.

Want to increase your net worth?

Surround yourself with people who are smarter and more accomplished than you are.

Don't chase money. Chase skills.

Add value to the market and money will follow.

You have 81% less purchasing power than your parents

A $30,000 income 40 years ago is the same as $162,342 today

Inflation is crushing your wealth

That's why you're broke. And why your parents could afford to live on a single income. 

You can get mad. Or you can get wealthy.

Everyone should have a side hustle that pays them $1,000 a month (at least)

- Don't rely on 1 income stream
- Don't rely on a "safe" 9 to 5
- Don't rely on a paycheck

Millionaires have 5-7 income streams

Here are 10 side hustles ideas you can monetize in 30 days or less:

🧵

1. Couch Flipping

- Find couches on Craigslist
- Make low-ball offers
- Pick it up with a truck
- Clean the cushions
- Offer free delivery
- Make a margin
- Repeat

I made $3K-$5K a month flipping couches before getting into real estate.

Build the life you want in 2024.

If you're not intentionally building your life, chances are someone is already doing it for you.

Here's the secret to success for 99% of:

• Millionaires next door
• Millionaire entrepreneurs
• Millionaire real estate investors

They've mastered the art of focus.

But most aren't willing to focus on one thing for a decade.

Focus + Reps + Time = Compounded Results

Bitcoin crossed $40,000 yesterday.

What's your best prediction for BTC in 2024?

Is it the year it breaks six figures...

Here's what I've realized as a 34-year-old CEO, investor, father, and husband:

Playing pro baseball was hard. 
Flipping 500+ houses was hard. 
Building a 1M social audience was hard. 
Becoming a great golfer is hard.

Running six businesses is hard. 
Running just one business is hard. 
Raising a family is hard. 
Staying healthy is hard. 
Growing your faith in God is hard. 
Having a great marriage is hard.

How do you raise millions of dollars for your next real estate deal?

Hang out where millionaires hang out.

Bring some sort of value to the table.
It doesn't have to be cash...

Millionaires love when you bring them great deals. Don't overcomplicate it.

If I gave you $1,000,000 to invest today, what asset class would you choose?

Here's the catch: you have to invest the entire million into one asset.

- Cash
- Real Estate
- Cryptocurrency
- Cash flowing business

Which would you choose?

𝗬𝗼𝘂'𝗹𝗹 𝗴𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝘂𝗽 𝗼𝗻 𝗕𝗜𝗚 𝗴𝗼𝗮𝗹𝘀 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝘆 𝗴𝗲𝘁 𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗶𝗳 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗽𝘂𝗿𝗽𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗶𝘀 𝗻𝗼𝘁 > 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝘀𝘁

- Time
- Money
- Stress

Expect these 3 costs when you chase big goals

Make sure you have a purpose strong enough to get you through.
